page.statement:
To complete this module you need to pass the following assessment; the passmark is 100%.

We recommend you read the questions carefully before answering. Once you have moved on you cannot return to previous questions.

question.text: Which of the following statements is correct?
question.ans: A detergent is used to destroy bacteria
A disinfectant is used to remove dirt and grease
A Sanitiser combines a disinfectant and a detergent

question.text: Which of the following requires cleaning and disinfecting?
Which of the following is the main reason for cleaning?
question.ans: To see any evidence of pest infestation
To ensure that the business is hygienic

question.text: Which of the following statements is true regarding cleaning equipment?
question.ans: After use, cleaning equipment should be cleaned and disinfected and allowed to dry
Cleaning equipment should be made of wood
Mops and cloths should be replaced daily
After use, cleaning equipment should be cleaned and stored overnight in a disinfectant

question.text: Which of the following is an essential rule when using a Sanitiser?
question.ans: Mix carefully with a detergent to make it more effective
Store the made-up solution in a refrigerator

question.text: Which of the following should be sanitised regularly?
What is the purpose of a disinfectant?
question.ans: To reduce bacteria to a safe level

question.text: What is the purpose of a detergent?
question.ans: To reduce bacteria to a safe level

question.text: Which of the following best describes contact time?
question.ans: The time a chemical can be stored safely
The maximum time a chemical should be in contact with the skin
The number of hours of training required by a cleaner
The time a chemical needs on a surface to be effective
